MenuItem.name: Component Types and Pricing Levels
MenuItem.privilege: Configure Component Types and Pricing Levels

MenuItem.name: Sales Optimizer Page Management
MenuItem.privilege: View Sales Optimizer Global Page List

DatabaseView.name: PA_RELATED_ZREP
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_RELATED_ZREP AS SELECT DISTINCT ACCOUNT_MANAGER, ACCOUNT_MANAGER_DESC FROM PA_ACCT_MANAGER;

Attribute.name: D_SOLD_TO_MKT_SUBSEG_BKT
Attribute.title: (C) Sold To Market Sub Segment Bkt

DatabaseView.name: PA_STRATEGIC_ACCT
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_STRATEGIC_ACCT AS SELECT DISTINCT STRATEGIC_ACCT_ID, STRATEGIC_ACCT FROM PA_CUSTOMER;

DatabaseView.name: PA_AGREEMENT_TYPE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL:
CREATE VIEW PA_AGREEMENT_TYPE AS SELECT 'REGIONAL' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE, 'REGIONAL' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'NATIONAL' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE, 'NATIONAL' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL
SELECT 'X-BU' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE, 'X-BU' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'RBPO' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE, 'RBPO' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'X-BUP' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE, 'X-BUP' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'REGP' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE, 'REGP' AS AGREEMENT_TYPE_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_PROD_HIER
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_PROD_HIER AS SELECT DISTINCT PROD_HIER, PROD_HIER_DESC FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PROD_HIER_4 AS PROD_HIER, PROD_HIER_4_DESC AS PROD_HIER_DESC from PA_PRODUCT UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT PROD_HIER_3 AS PROD_HIER, PROD_HIER_3_DESC AS PROD_HIER_DESC from PA_PRODUCT UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT PROD_HIER_2 AS PROD_HIER, PROD_HIER_2_DESC AS PROD_HIER_DESC from PA_PRODUCT UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT PROD_HIER_1 AS PROD_HIER, PROD_HIER_1_DESC AS PROD_HIER_DESC from PA_PRODUCT )X WHERE PROD_HIER NOT LIKE '%All%' UNION ALL SELECT '(All)', '(All)';

DatabaseView.name: PA_PROD_HIER_3
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_PROD_HIER_3 AS SELECT DISTINCT PROD_HIER_3, PROD_HIER_3_DESC FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PROD_HIER_3, PROD_HIER_3_DESC from PA_PRODUCT )X WHERE PROD_HIER_3 NOT LIKE 'All%' UNION ALL SELECT '(All)', '(All)';

DatabaseView.name: PA_STRAT_ACCT
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_STRAT_ACCT AS SELECT DISTINCT STRATEGIC_ACCT_ID AS STRAT_ACCT FROM PA_CUSTOMER;

DatabaseView.name: PA_STRAT_ACCT_MKT_SEG
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_STRAT_ACCT_MKT_SEG AS SELECT DISTINCT STRATEGIC_ACCT_MKT_SEG AS STRAT_ACCT_MKT_SEG , '(' + STRATEGIC_ACCT_MKT_SEG + ') ' + STRATEGIC_ACCT_MKT_SUB AS STRAT_ACCT_MKT_SUB FROM PA_CUSTOMER WHERE STRATEGIC_ACCT_MKT_SEG NOT LIKE 'Un%' AND STRATEGIC_ACCT_MKT_SUB NOT LIKE 'Un%'

DatabaseView.name: PA_SM_DM_MANAGER
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_SM_DM_MANAGER AS SELECT DISTINCT SALES_MANAGER, SALES_MANAGER_DESC, DISTRICT_MANAGER, DISTRICT_MANAGER_DESC FROM PA_ACCT_MANAGER;

DatabaseView.name: PA_DM_AVP_MANAGER
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_DM_AVP_MANAGER AS SELECT DISTINCT DISTRICT_MANAGER, DISTRICT_MANAGER_DESC, AVP, AVP_DESC FROM PA_ACCT_MANAGER;

DatabaseView.name: PA_DIVISION
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_DIVISION AS SELECT 'CE00' AS DIVISION, 'CE00' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '(All)' AS DIVISION, 'All' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'NO00' AS DIVISION, 'NO00' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'SO00' AS DIVISION, 'SO00' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'SF00' AS DIVISION, 'SF00' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'SG00' AS DIVISION, 'SG00' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'WE00' AS DIVISION, 'WE00' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'AG00' AS DIVISION, 'z AG00' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'SF01' AS DIVISION, 'z SF01' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'MG00' AS DIVISION, 'z MG00' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'NI00' AS DIVISION, 'z NI00' AS DIVISION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'GS00' AS DIVISION, 'GS00' AS DIVISION_DESC ;

Dimension.name: SOLD_TO
Dimension.title: Top Lvl Custmr (Only for Dep. Filter)

DatabaseView.name: PA_ACCOUNT_TYPE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_ACCOUNT_TYPE AS SELECT DISTINCT ACCT_TYPE AS ACCOUNT_TYPE, ACCT_TYPE AS ACCOUNT_TYPE_DESC FROM PA_CUSTOMER;

DatabaseView.name: PA_EXISTING_NEW_IND
DatabaseView.ViewDDL:
CREATE VIEW PA_EXISTING_NEW_IND AS SELECT 'Unknown' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND, 'Unknown' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'New' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND, 'New' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Offline' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND, 'Offline' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND_DESC
UNION ALL SELECT 'RAPI-Existing(Transacted)' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND, 'RAPI-Existing(Transacted)' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'RAPI-Existing(Non-Transacted)' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND, 'RAPI-Existing(Non-Transacted)' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Offline - Agreement' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND, 'Offline - Agreement' AS EXISTING_NEW_IND_DESC ;

DatabaseView.name: PA_BASELINE_PRICE_TYPE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_BASELINE_PRICE_TYPE AS SELECT DISTINCT BASELINE_PRICE_TYPE, BASELINE_PRICE_TYPE AS BASELINE_PRICE_TYPE_DESC FROM PA_TRANSACTIONS_CUBE;

DatabaseView.name: PA_CONTRACT
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_CONTRACT AS SELECT 'NONE' AS CONTRACT,'NONE' AS CONTRACT_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'REGIONAL'AS CONTRACT,'REGIONAL' AS CONTRACT_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'NATIONAL'AS CONTRACT,'NATIONAL' AS CONTRACT_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_BID_REASON
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_BID_REASON AS SELECT '2' AS BID_REASON,'(2) Sales Lead' AS BID_REASON_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '0' AS BID_REASON,'(0) Customer Request' AS BID_REASON_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '-10' AS BID_REASON,'(-10) Reverse Auction' AS BID_REASON_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_BID_HISTORY
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_BID_HISTORY AS SELECT '0' AS BID_HISTORY, '(0) None' AS BID_HISTORY_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '-3' AS BID_HISTORY, '(-3) Less Than 3' AS BID_HISTORY_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '-6' AS BID_HISTORY,'(-6) 3 or More' AS BID_HISTORY_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_CORE_DATA
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_CORE_DATA AS SELECT '0' AS CORE_DATA, '(0) Less than 50%' AS CORE_DATA_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '1' AS CORE_DATA, '(1) Between 50-75%' AS CORE_DATA_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS CORE_DATA,'(2) Between 75-95%' AS CORE_DATA_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS CORE_DATA,'(3) More than 95%' AS CORE_DATA_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_DATA_QUALITY
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_DATA_QUALITY AS SELECT '0' AS DATA_QUALITY, '(0) Less than 25%' AS DATA_QUALITY_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '1' AS DATA_QUALITY, '(1) Between 25-50%' AS DATA_QUALITY_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS DATA_QUALITY,'(2) Between 50-75%' AS DATA_QUALITY_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS DATA_QUALITY,'(3) Between 75-95%' AS DATA_QUALITY_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '4' AS DATA_QUALITY,'(4) More than 95%' AS DATA_QUALITY_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_CONTRACT_COMPLIANCE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_CONTRACT_COMPLIANCE AS SELECT '0' AS CONTRACT_COMPLIANCE, '(0) No Compliance/Support' AS CONTRACT_COMPLIANCE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '4' AS CONTRACT_COMPLIANCE, '(4) Corporate Support' AS CONTRACT_COMPLIANCE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '6' AS CONTRACT_COMPLIANCE,'(6) Mandatory' AS CONTRACT_COMPLIANCE_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_REVENUE_BUCKET
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_REVENUE_BUCKET AS SELECT '0' AS REVENUE_BUCKET, '(0) No Revenue' AS REVENUE_BUCKET_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Less than $50K' AS REVENUE_BUCKET, '(1) Less than $50K' AS REVENUE_BUCKET_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Between $50K-100K' AS REVENUE_BUCKET,'(2) Between $50K-100K' AS REVENUE_BUCKET_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Between $100K-400K' AS REVENUE_BUCKET,'(3) Between $100K-400K' AS REVENUE_BUCKET_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'More than $400K-800K' AS REVENUE_BUCKET,'(4) More than $400K-800K' AS REVENUE_BUCKET_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'More than $800K' AS REVENUE_BUCKET,'(5) More than $800K' AS REVENUE_BUCKET_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_SO_USER
PA_YES_NO
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_YES_NO AS SELECT 'Yes' AS YES_NO, 'Yes' AS YES_NO_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'No' AS YES_NO, 'No' AS YES_NO_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Prorated' AS YES_NO, 'Prorated' AS YES_NO_DESC

DatabaseView.name: PA_FEE_STATUS
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_FEE_STATUS AS SELECT 'Bundled' AS FEE_STATUS, 'Bundled' AS FEE_STATUS_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Flat Fee' AS FEE_STATUS, 'Flat Fee' AS FEE_STATUS_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Exempt' AS FEE_STATUS, 'Exempt' AS FEE_STATUS_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Regional Default' AS FEE_STATUS, 'Regional Default' AS FEE_STATUS_DESC

DatabaseView.name: PA_ACCOUNT_GROUP
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_ACCOUNT_GROUP AS SELECT 'HN1' AS ACCOUNT_GROUP, 'HN1' AS ACCOUNT_GROUP_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'SOLD-TO' AS ACCOUNT_GROUP, 'SOLD-TO' AS ACCOUNT_GROUP_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'SHIP-TO' AS ACCOUNT_GROUP, 'SHIP-TO' AS ACCOUNT_GROUP_DESC

DatabaseView.name: PA_TCO_REQUIREMENT
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_TCO_REQUIREMENT AS SELECT 'Guaranteed' AS TCO_REQUIREMENT, 'Guaranteed' AS TCO_REQUIREMENT_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Targeted' AS TCO_REQUIREMENT, 'Targeted' AS TCO_REQUIREMENT_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'N/A' AS TCO_REQUIREMENT, 'N/A' AS TCO_REQUIREMENT_DESC

DatabaseView.name: PA_FIN_APPROVAL
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_FIN_APPROVAL AS SELECT 'Yes' AS FIN_APPROVAL, 'Yes' AS FIN_APPROVAL_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'No' AS FIN_APPROVAL, 'No' AS FIN_APPROVAL_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Less than $500K incr. and $1M total' AS FIN_APPROVAL, 'Less than $500K incr. and $1M total' AS FIN_APPROVAL_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_CONTRACT_TYPE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_CONTRACT_TYPE AS SELECT 'Mandatory' AS CONTRACT_TYPE, 'Mandatory' AS CONTRACT_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Preferred' AS CONTRACT_TYPE, 'Preferred' AS CONTRACT_TYPE_DESC

DatabaseView.name: PA_CUST_SIZE_BKT
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_CUST_SIZE_BKT AS SELECT DISTINCT CUST_SIZE AS CUST_SIZE_BKT, CUST_SIZE AS CUST_SIZE_BKT_DESC FROM PA_CUSTOMER

DatabaseView.name: PA_RESTRICTION_TYPE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_RESTRICTION_TYPE AS SELECT 'None' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE, 'None' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Cap' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE, 'Cap' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Index' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE, 'Index' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'First Year' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE, 'First Year' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Firm for Term' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE, 'Firm for Term' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Until Date Specified' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE, 'Until Date Specified' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Other' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE, 'Other' AS RESTRICTION_TYPE_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_TCFS_DEFINITION
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_TCFS_DEFINITION AS SELECT 'Allowed/Subject to Fee' AS TCFS_DEFINITION, 'Allowed/Subject to Fee' AS TCFS_DEFINITION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Firm for Term' AS TCFS_DEFINITION, 'Firm for Term' AS TCFS_DEFINITION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Exempt from - Permanent' AS TCFS_DEFINITION, 'Exempt from - Permanent' AS TCFS_DEFINITION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Exempt from – Other' AS TCFS_DEFINITION, 'Exempt from – Other' AS TCFS_DEFINITION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'NA to this contract' AS TCFS_DEFINITION, 'NA to this contract' AS TCFS_DEFINITION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'No Selection' AS TCFS_DEFINITION, 'No Selection' AS TCFS_DEFINITION_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE AS SELECT '1' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE, 'Letter' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE, 'Hand Delivered' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE, 'Signature Required' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '4' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE, 'Email' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '5' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE, 'Phone/Fax' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '6' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE, 'Custom' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '7' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE, 'SDFC' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '8' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE, 'Certified Mail' AS ADVANCE_NOTIF_TYPE_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_DSC_OF_PROD
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_DSC_OF_PROD AS SELECT '01' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'INDUSTRIAL BULK' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'INDUSTRIAL MICROBULK' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'INDUSTRIAL BULK/MICROBULK' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '05' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/RENT' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '06' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/RENT/SAFETY' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '07' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/SAFETY' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '08' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/HARDGOODS' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '09' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/HARDGOODS/SAFETY' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '10' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/RENT/HARDGOODS' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '11' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/RENT/HARDGOODS/SAFETY' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '12' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/BULK' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '13' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/BULK/HARDGOODS' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '14' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/BULK/HARDGOODS/SAFETY' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '15' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/BULK/SAFETY' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '16' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/RENT/BULK' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '17' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/RENT/BULK/HARDGOODS' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '18' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/RENT/BULK/HARDGOODS/SAFETY' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '19' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'CYLINDER GAS/RENT/BULK/SAFETY' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '20' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'MEDICAL BULK' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '21' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'MEDICAL MICROBULK' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '22' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'MEDICAL BULK/MICROBULK' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '23' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'MEDICAL CYLINDER GAS' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '24' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'MEDICAL CYLINDER GAS/RENT' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '25' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'MEDICAL CYLINDER GAS/BULK' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '26' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'MEDICAL CYLINDER GAS/RENT/BULK' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '27' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'HARDGOODS' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '28' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'HARDGOODS/SAFETY' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '29' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'SAFETY' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '30' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'LEASE' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '31' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'RENT' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '32' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'OTHER' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '33' AS DSC_OF_PROD, 'BULK/MICROBULK/CYLINDER' AS DSC_OF_PROD_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_SERVICES_BILLABLE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_SERVICES_BILLABLE AS SELECT '01' AS SERVICES_BILLABLE, 'Null' AS SERVICES_BILLABLE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS SERVICES_BILLABLE, 'Yes - Except Preventative Maintenance' AS SERVICES_BILLABLE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS SERVICES_BILLABLE, 'Yes - Customer owned' AS SERVICES_BILLABLE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS SERVICES_BILLABLE, 'Yes' AS SERVICES_BILLABLE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '05' AS SERVICES_BILLABLE, 'No' AS SERVICES_BILLABLE_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_BILLABLE_DEFINITION
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_BILLABLE_DEFINITION AS SELECT 'Null' AS BILLABLE_DEFINITION, 'Null' AS BILLABLE_DEFINITION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Yes - Except Preventative Maintenance' AS BILLABLE_DEFINITION, 'Yes - Except Preventative Maintenance' AS BILLABLE_DEFINITION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Yes - Customer owned' AS BILLABLE_DEFINITION, 'Yes - Customer owned' AS BILLABLE_DEFINITION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'Yes' AS BILLABLE_DEFINITION, 'Yes' AS BILLABLE_DEFINITION_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'No' AS BILLABLE_DEFINITION, 'No' AS BILLABLE_DEFINITION_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_TANK_OWNERSHIP
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_TANK_OWNERSHIP AS SELECT '01' AS TANK_OWNERSHIP, 'Null' AS TANK_OWNERSHIP_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS TANK_OWNERSHIP, 'Customer' AS TANK_OWNERSHIP_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS TANK_OWNERSHIP, 'Airgas' AS TANK_OWNERSHIP_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS TANK_OWNERSHIP, 'Third Party' AS TANK_OWNERSHIP_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM AS SELECT '01' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM, 'CCF' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM_DSC UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM, 'GA' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM_DSC UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM, 'LB' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM_DSC UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM, 'LT' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM_DSC UNION ALL SELECT '05' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM, 'SCF' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM_DSC UNION ALL SELECT '06' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM, 'TON' AS CONTRACTED_VOLUME_UOM_DSC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE AS SELECT '01' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '01: New Agreement – With Signatures' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '02: First Fill' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '03: ZMV Changes' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '04: Update Date Field(s)' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '05' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '05: Change Agreement Owner' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '06' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '06: Agreement Header Changes' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '07' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '07: Regional Agreement API' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '08' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '08: Agr Price Increase (non-API)' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '09' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '09: Deferred API' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '10' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '10: F & S Increase' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '11' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '11: F & S Decrease' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '12' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '12: Agr Pricing Expiration/Correction' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '13' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '13: Agr Pricing Moved To/From a Sales Deal/Agreement' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '14' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '14: Agr Closing Account (Bad Debt, Bankruptcy Write-off, or Other)' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '15' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '15: Agr Pricing Clean-up/Standardization' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '16' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '16: Agr New Material' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '17' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '17: Agr Existing Price Decrease' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '18' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '18: Agr Rollback of Price Increase' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '19' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '19: Agr Acquisition' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '20' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE, '20: Agr Other' AS SO_REG_AGR_REASON_CODE_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_YES_NO_NULL
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_YES_NO_NULL AS SELECT '01' AS YES_NO_NULL, 'Yes' AS YES_NO_NULL_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS YES_NO_NULL, 'No' AS YES_NO_NULL_DESC UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS YES_NO_NULL, 'Null' AS YES_NO_NULL_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_CHECKBOX
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_CHECKBOX AS SELECT 'Yes' AS CHECKBOX, 'Yes' AS CHECKBOX_DESC UNION ALL SELECT 'No' AS CHECKBOX, 'No' AS CHECKBOX_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_LIABILITY_LANG
PA_STANDARD_MODIFIED

Measure.name: IMPACT_AT_TARGET
Measure.title: Impact at target

Measure.name: IMPACT_AFTER_INFLATION_ROUND1
Measure.title: Impact after inflation round1

Measure.name: IMPACT_AFTER_INFLATION_ROUND2
Measure.title: Impact after inflation round2

Measure.name: IMPACT_AFTER_PRODUCT_CAP
Measure.title: Impact after product cap

Measure.name: IMPACT_AFTER_RETAIL_CAP
Measure.title: Impact after retail cap

Measure.name: IMPACT_AFTER_CUSTOMER_CAP
Measure.title: Impact

Measure.name: RECOMMENDED_CHANGE_PCT
Measure.title: Recommended change pct (row-DNU)
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ISNULL(RECOMMENDED_PRICE, 0) != 0 THEN CASE WHEN [CURRENT_PRICE] > 0 THEN (([RECOMMENDED_PRICE] - [CURRENT_PRICE]) * 100 / [CURRENT_PRICE]) ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END}

Measure.name: RECOMMENDED_GM_PCT
Measure.title: Recommended gm pct (row-DNU)
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ISNULL(UNIT_COST, 0) != 0 THEN CASE WHEN [RECOMMENDED_PRICE] > 0 THEN (1 - [UNIT_COST] / [RECOMMENDED_PRICE]) ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END}

Measure.name: REC_PRICE_PCT_OF_TARGET
Measure.title: Rec price pct of target (row-DNU)
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ISNULL(RECOMMENDED_PRICE, 0) != 0 THEN CASE WHEN [TARGET_PRICE] > 0 THEN ([RECOMMENDED_PRICE] / [TARGET_PRICE]) ELSE 1 END ELSE 0 END}

Measure.name: OPPORTUNITY_PERCENT_OF_ADDR_REV
Measure.title: Annual Final Opp % of Addr. Rev.

Measure.name: BENEFIT_PERCENT_OF_ADDR_REV
Measure.title: Annualized Actual Benefit % of Addr. Rev.

Measure.name: FINAL_OPPTY_PRCT_OF_REC_OPPTY
Measure.title: Annual Final Opp % Of Rec Opp

Measure.name: ANNUALIZED_BENEFIT_PRCT_OF_FINAL_OPPTY
Measure.title: Annualized Actual Benefit % Of Final Opp

Measure.name: PG_FLOOR_TGT_OPP
Measure.title: ZMIN - ZMKT Opportunity
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] > [PG_FLOOR_REV] AND [PG_TARGET_REV] > [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] THEN ([PG_TARGET_REV]-[ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE]) ELSE NULL END}

Measure.name: PG_TGT_EXP_OPP
Measure.title: ZMKT - ZPRM Opportunity
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] > [PG_TARGET_REV] AND [PG_EXPERT_REV] > [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] THEN ([PG_EXPERT_REV]-[ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE]) ELSE NULL END}

Measure.name: REV_BELOW_FLOOR
Measure.title: Revenue below ZMIN
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] < [PG_FLOOR_REV] AND [PG_FLOOR_REV] IS NOT NULL THEN [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] ELSE NULL END}

Measure.name: REV_BTWN_FLOOR_TGT
Measure.title: Revenue btwn ZMIN and ZMKT
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] > [PG_FLOOR_REV] AND [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] < [PG_TARGET_REV] AND [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] IS NOT NULL AND [PG_TARGET_REV] IS NOT NULL THEN [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] ELSE NULL END}

Measure.name: REV_BTWN_TGT_EXP
Measure.title: Revenue btwn ZMKT and ZPRM
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] > [PG_TARGET_REV] AND [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] < [PG_EXPERT_REV] AND [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] IS NOT NULL AND [PG_TARGET_REV] IS NOT NULL THEN [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] ELSE NULL END}

Measure.name: REV_ABOVE_EXP
Measure.title: Revenue above ZPRM
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] > [PG_EXPERT_REV] AND [PG_EXPERT_REV] IS NOT NULL THEN [ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE] ELSE NULL END}

Measure.name: TRANSACTION_MARGIN_PCT
Measure.title: Tx. Gross Margin (%)
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE - ADJUSTED_KZWI4)/ ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE END}

Measure.name: ZBPR_CUST_LVL
Measure.title: Customer Specific Pricing
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN CUST_LEVEL IN ('HN1', 'SOLD-TO', 'SHIP-TO') OR CUST_LEVEL LIKE '%AGREEMENT' THEN ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: ZBPR_CUST_MATNR_LVL
Measure.title: Customer Specific Material Level Pricing
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN (CUST_LEVEL IN ('HN1', 'SOLD-TO', 'SHIP-TO') OR CUST_LEVEL LIKE '%AGREEMENT') AND PROD_LEVEL = 'Material' THEN ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE_DAILY
Measure.title: Daily Rent
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = 'ZRNT' AND BASE_UOM_ADJUSTED = 'DAY' THEN ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE_MONTHLY
Measure.title: Monthly Rent
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = 'ZRNT' AND BASE_UOM_ADJUSTED = 'ZM' THEN ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE_FLAT
Measure.title: Flat Rent
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = 'ZRNT' AND BASE_UOM_ADJUSTED = 'ZF' THEN ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE_ZMV
Measure.title: ZMV Rent
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = 'ZMV' THEN ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE_RENT
Measure.title: Rent Revenue
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('ZRNT', 'ZMV') THEN ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: DAILY_RENT_DAYS
Measure.title: Daily Rent Days
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = 'ZRNT' AND BASE_UOM_ADJUSTED = 'DAY' THEN QTY_IN_BASE_UOM_ADJUSTED ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: MONTHLY_RENT_CYLINDERS
Measure.title: Monthly Rent Cylinders
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = 'ZRNT' AND BASE_UOM_ADJUSTED = 'ZM' THEN QTY_IN_BASE_UOM_ADJUSTED ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: FLAT_RENT_QTY
Measure.title: Flat Rent Qty
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE = 'ZRNT' AND BASE_UOM_ADJUSTED = 'ZF' THEN QTY_IN_BASE_UOM_ADJUSTED ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: ADJ_ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE_CMoM
Measure.title: Adj. Actual Customer Price - Prior Period

Measure.name: ADJ_ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE_CYoY
Measure.title: Adj. Actual Customer Price - Prior Year

Measure.name: ADJUSTED_KZWI4_CMoM
Measure.title: Adj. Cost of Sales - Prior Period

Measure.name: ADJ_PRODUCT_GROSS_MARGIN_DOLLARS_CMoM
Measure.title: Adj. Product Gross Margin ($) - Prior Period

Measure.name: ADJ_PRODUCT_GROSS_MARGIN_PCT_CMoM
Measure.title: Adj. Product Gross Margin (%) - Prior Period

Measure.name: NEWTR_INVOICE_PRICE_EXCL_RENT_LEASE
Measure.title: Total Invoice Price (excl. Rent/Lease)
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('ZRNT', 'ZLR', 'ZMV') THEN 0.00 ELSE NETWR_INVOICE_PRICE END}

Measure.name: NEWTR_INVOICE_PRICE_RENT_LEASE
Measure.title: Total Invoice Price (Rent/Lease)
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('ZRNT', 'ZLR', 'ZMV') THEN NETWR_INVOICE_PRICE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE_EXCL_RENT_LEASE
Measure.title: Actual Customer Price (excl. Rent/Lease)
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('ZRNT', 'ZLR', 'ZMV') THEN 0.00 ELSE ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE END}

Measure.name: ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE_RENT_LEASE
Measure.title: Actual Customer Price (Rent/Lease)
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BILL_TYPE IN ('ZRNT', 'ZLR', 'ZMV') THEN ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: WTD_AVG_UNIT_PRICE_CMoM
Measure.title: Wtd. Avg. Unit Price - Prior Period

Measure.name: WTD_AVG_UNIT_PRICE_CYoY
Measure.title: Wtd. Avg. Unit Price - Prior Year

Measure.name: WTD_AVG_VOL_UNIT_PRICE_CMoM
Measure.title: Wtd. Avg. Vol. Unit Price - Prior Period

Measure.name: WTD_AVG_VOL_UNIT_PRICE_CYoY
Measure.title: Wtd. Avg. Vol. Unit Price - Prior Year

Measure.name: ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE_BASELINE
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN BASELINE_UNIT_PRICE IS NOT NULL THEN [QTY_IN_BASE_UOM_ADJUSTED] * [BASELINE_UNIT_PRICE] ELSE ZBPR_PRODUCT_PRICE END}
Measure.title: Baseline Revenue

Measure.name: CUSTOMER_PRICE_WITH_ZMGR
Measure.title: Manager Overridden Revenue ($)
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ISNULL(ZMGR_MANAGER_OVERRIDE, 0) != 0 THEN CUSTOMER_PRICE ELSE 0 END}

Measure.name: CUSTOMER_PRICE_WITH_ZRTO
Measure.title: Retail Overridden Revenue ($)
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ISNULL(ZRTO_RETAIL_OVERRIDE, 0) != 0 THEN CUSTOMER_PRICE ELSE 0 END}

Measure.name: WTD_AVG_VOL_PRICE_DIFFERENCE_YOY
Measure.title: Wtd. Avg. Vol. Price Variance - YoY

Measure.name: WTD_AVG_PRICE_PERC_DIFFERENCE_YOY
Measure.title: Wtd. Avg. Vol. Price Variance (%) - YoY

Measure.name: DAILY_VAR_DUE_PRICE
Measure.title: Daily Variance ($) due to Price - YoY

Measure.name: DAILY_VAR_DUE_VOLUME
Measure.title: Daily Variance ($) due to Volume - YoY

Measure.name: NON_DROP_SHIP_HH
Measure.title: Non-Drop Shipped HG
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ACTUAL_HG_PRICE > 0 AND INCO1_TERM1 <> 'FPV' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END}

DatabaseView.name: PA_IMPL_TRACKING_CUBE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_IMPL_TRACKING_CUBE AS SELECT X.SHIP_TO AS SHIP_TO_PK, X.SHIP_TO AS SHIP_TO, ISNULL(G.GEOG_SALES_OFFICE, 'Unknown_Sales_Office') AS GEOG_SALES_OFFICE, ISNULL(A.ACCOUNT_MANAGER, 'Unknown_Account_mgr') AS ACCOUNT_MANAGER, 1 AS SHIP_TO_COUNT FROM PA_CUSTOMER X LEFT JOIN PA_ACCT_MANAGER A ON X.CUST_ACCT_MGR = A.ACCOUNT_MANAGER LEFT JOIN PA_GEOGRAPHY G ON X.CUST_SALES_OFFICE = G.GEOG_SALES_OFFICE LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT SHIP_TO FROM PA_TRANSACTIONS_CUBE WHERE DAY BETWEEN CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEADD(YYYY, -1, GETDATE()), 112) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 112)) Y ON X.SHIP_TO = Y.SHIP_TO WHERE Y.SHIP_TO IS NULL AND X.SHIP_TO NOT LIKE 'AG00%' AND STRAT_CODE_1 NOT LIKE 'No%' AND STRAT_CODE_1 NOT LIKE 'Unknown%'

Measure.name: DELIVERY_ACTUAL_FEE
Measure.title: Delivery Actual Fee
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN FEE_TYPE='DELIVERY_FEE' THEN ACTUAL_FEE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: DELIVERY_EXPECTED_FEE
Measure.title: Delivery Expected Fee
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN FEE_TYPE='DELIVERY_FEE' THEN EXPECTED_FEE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: DELIVERY_APPROVED_FEE
Measure.title: Delivery Approved Fee
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN FEE_TYPE='DELIVERY_FEE' THEN APPROVED_FEE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: FUEL_ACTUAL_FEE
Measure.title: Fuel Actual Fee
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN FEE_TYPE='FUEL_SURCHARGE' THEN ACTUAL_FEE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: FUEL_EXPECTED_FEE
Measure.title: Fuel Expected Fee
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN FEE_TYPE='FUEL_SURCHARGE' THEN EXPECTED_FEE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: FUEL_APPROVED_FEE
Measure.title: Fuel Approved Fee
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN FEE_TYPE='FUEL_SURCHARGE' THEN APPROVED_FEE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: HAZMAT_ACTUAL_FEE
Measure.title: Hazmat Actual Fee
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN FEE_TYPE LIKE '%HAZMAT%' THEN ACTUAL_FEE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: HAZMAT_EXPECTED_FEE
Measure.title: Hazmat Expected Fee
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN FEE_TYPE LIKE '%HAZMAT%' THEN EXPECTED_FEE ELSE 0.00 END}

Measure.name: HAZMAT_APPROVED_FEE
Measure.title: Hazmat Approved Fee
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN FEE_TYPE LIKE '%HAZMAT%' THEN APPROVED_FEE ELSE 0.00 END}

DatabaseView.name: PA_OPPORTUNITY_CUBE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_OPPORTUNITY_CUBE AS SELECT O.ID AS OPPORTUNITY_CUBE_ID, S.ACCT_MANAGER AS ACCOUNT_MANAGER, M.SALES_MANAGER, M.DISTRICT_MANAGER, O.ID AS OPPORTUNITY_ID, O.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID, O.STAGE_ID AS STAGE, O.ACCOUNT_ID, 'REC_IMPACT' = SUM(CASE WHEN AV.FIELD_DEF_ID = 186510 THEN ISNULL(AV.DECIMAL_VALUE, 0) ELSE 0.00 END), 'FINAL_IMPACT' = SUM(CASE WHEN AV.FIELD_DEF_ID = 186509 THEN ISNULL(AV.DECIMAL_VALUE, 0) ELSE 0.00 END), 'ADDR_REV' = SUM(CASE WHEN AV.FIELD_DEF_ID = 186507 THEN ISNULL(AV.DECIMAL_VALUE, 0) ELSE 0.00 END), 'ADDR_LINE_COUNT' = SUM(CASE WHEN AV.FIELD_DEF_ID = 186508 THEN ISNULL(AV.DECIMAL_VALUE, 0) ELSE 0.00 END), 'ADDRESSED_LINE_COUNT' = SUM(CASE WHEN AV.FIELD_DEF_ID = 186512 THEN ISNULL(AV.DECIMAL_VALUE, 0) ELSE 0.00 END) FROM SO_OPPORTUNITY O JOIN SO_ACCOUNT A ON O.ACCOUNT_ID = A.ID JOIN PM_SCOPE S ON A.KEY_DIM_SCOPE_ID = S.SCOPE_ID JOIN SO_OPPT_ALTERNATIVE SA ON O.ID = SA.OPPORTUNITY_ID JOIN PA_ACCT_MANAGER M ON S.ACCT_MANAGER = M.ACCOUNT_MANAGER LEFT JOIN SO_OPPT_ALT_FIELD_VAL AV ON SA.PRIMARY_OPPT_PART_ID = AV.OPPORTUNITY_PART_ID WHERE O.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID = 50676 GROUP BY S.ACCT_MANAGER, M.SALES_MANAGER, M.DISTRICT_MANAGER, O.ID, O.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID, O.STAGE_ID, O.ACCOUNT_ID;

DatabaseView.name: PA_DM_OPPORTUNITY_CUBE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL:
CREATE VIEW PA_DM_OPPORTUNITY_CUBE AS SELECT CONCAT(OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_ID,'&', MAX(OPPORTUNITY_LINE.ACCOUNT_ID)) AS DM_OPPORTUNITY_CUBE_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, SALES_MANAGER, OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID, OPPORTUNITY_ID, MAX(STAGE.STAGE) AS STAGE, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM
( SELECT
ACCT.ID AS ACCOUNT_ID, ACCTMNGR.SALES_MANAGER AS SALES_MANAGER, OPPTYPE.ID AS OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID, MAX(STAGE.STAGE) AS STAGE, OPP.ID AS OPPORTUNITY_ID
FROM SO_ACCOUNT ACCT, SO_OPPT_ALTERNATIVE ALT, SO_OPPORTUNITY OPP, SO_OPPORTUNITY_TYPE OPPTYPE, PM_SCOPE SCOPE, PA_ACCT_MANAGER ACCTMNGR, PA_STAGE STAGE, SO_ACCOUNT_TYPE TYPE
WHERE
OPP.ID = ALT.OPPORTUNITY_ID AND ACCT.KEY_DIM_SCOPE_ID = SCOPE.SCOPE_ID AND OPP.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID = OPPTYPE.ID AND SCOPE.ACCT_MANAGER = ACCTMNGR.SALES_MANAGER AND ACCT.ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID = TYPE.ID AND SCOPE.DIMENSION_SET_LEVEL_ID = TYPE.KEY_DIM_SET_LEVEL_ID AND OPP.ACCOUNT_ID = ACCT.ID AND OPP.STAGE_ID = STAGE.STAGE
GROUP BY OPP.ID, ACCT.ID, OPPTYPE.ID, ACCTMNGR.SALES_MANAGER) OPPORTUNITY_LINE,
PA_STAGE STAGE
WHERE STAGE.STAGE = OPPORTUNITY_LINE.STAGE
GROUP BY OPPORTUNITY_LINE.ACCOUNT_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.SALES_MANAGER, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID

DatabaseView.name: PA_AVP_OPP_CUBE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL:
CREATE VIEW PA_AVP_OPP_CUBE AS
SELECT CONCAT(OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_ID,'&', MAX(OPPORTUNITY_LINE.ACCOUNT_ID)) AS AVP_OPP_CUBE_ID, ACCOUNT_ID AS ACCOUNT_ID, DISTRICT_MANAGER, OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID, OPPORTUNITY_ID, MAX(STAGE.STAGE) AS STAGE, COUNT(*) AS COUNT
FROM
( SELECT
ACCT.ID AS ACCOUNT_ID, ACCTMNGR.DISTRICT_MANAGER AS DISTRICT_MANAGER, OPPTYPE.ID AS OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID, MAX(STAGE.STAGE) AS STAGE, OPP.ID AS OPPORTUNITY_ID
FROM
SO_ACCOUNT ACCT, SO_OPPT_ALTERNATIVE ALT, SO_OPPORTUNITY OPP, SO_OPPORTUNITY_TYPE OPPTYPE, PM_SCOPE SCOPE, PA_ACCT_MANAGER ACCTMNGR, PA_STAGE STAGE, SO_ACCOUNT_TYPE TYPE
WHERE
OPP.ID = ALT.OPPORTUNITY_ID AND ACCT.KEY_DIM_SCOPE_ID = SCOPE.SCOPE_ID AND OPP.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID = OPPTYPE.ID AND SCOPE.ACCT_MANAGER = ACCTMNGR.DISTRICT_MANAGER AND ACCT.ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID = TYPE.ID AND SCOPE.DIMENSION_SET_LEVEL_ID = TYPE.KEY_DIM_SET_LEVEL_ID AND OPP.ACCOUNT_ID = ACCT.ID AND OPP.STAGE_ID = STAGE.STAGE
GROUP BY OPP.ID, ACCT.ID, OPPTYPE.ID , ACCTMNGR.DISTRICT_MANAGER) OPPORTUNITY_LINE,
PA_STAGE STAGE
WHERE STAGE.STAGE = OPPORTUNITY_LINE.STAGE
GROUP BY OPPORTUNITY_LINE.ACCOUNT_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.DISTRICT_MANAGER, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID

DatabaseView.name: PA_WORKFLOW_CUBE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL:
CREATE VIEW PA_WORKFLOW_CUBE AS
SELECT CONCAT(OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_ID,'&', MAX(OPPORTUNITY_LINE.ACCOUNT_ID)) AS WORKFLOW_CUBE_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.ACCOUNT_ID AS ACCOUNT_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_ID AS OPPORTUNITY_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID AS OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.CREATED_BY AS SO_USER, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.UPDATED_BY AS SO_USER_UPDATED_BY, MAX(STAGE.STAGE) AS STAGE, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT ACCT.ID AS ACCOUNT_ID, OPP.ID AS OPPORTUNITY_ID, OPPTYPE.ID AS OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID, OPP.CREATED_BY AS CREATED_BY, OPP.UPDATED_BY AS UPDATED_BY, MAX(OPP.STAGE_ID) AS STAGE_ID FROM SO_ACCOUNT ACCT, SO_OPPT_ALTERNATIVE ALT, SO_OPPORTUNITY OPP, SO_ACCOUNT_TYPE TYPE, SO_OPPORTUNITY_TYPE OPPTYPE WHERE OPP.ID = ALT.OPPORTUNITY_ID AND OPP.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID = OPPTYPE.ID AND OPP.ACCOUNT_ID = ACCT.ID AND ACCT.ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID = TYPE.ID AND OPP.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID = OPPTYPE.ID AND OPPTYPE.NAME IN ('Price Maintenance Request (GPR)', 'GPR Pricing', 'New Regional RFP Opportunity', 'New RFP Opportunity', 'Sales Agreement') AND TYPE.NAME IN ('Customer Account', 'Customer Account (Sold-To)', 'Strategic Account Sales Leader', 'Strategic Account') GROUP BY ACCT.ID, OPP.ID, OPPTYPE.ID, OPP.CREATED_BY, OPP.UPDATED_BY) OPPORTUNITY_LINE, PA_STAGE STAGE WHERE STAGE.STAGE = OPPORTUNITY_LINE.STAGE_ID GROUP BY OPPORTUNITY_LINE.ACCOUNT_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.CREATED_BY, OPPORTUNITY_LINE.UPDATED_BY

DatabaseView.name: PA_SO_USER_UPDATED_BY
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_SO_USER_UPDATED_BY AS SELECT DISTINCT A.NAME AS SO_USER_UPDATED_BY, B.FIRST_NAME + ' ' + B.LAST_NAME + ' - (' + A.NAME + ')' AS SO_USER_UPDATED_BY_DESC FROM SY_PRNCPLS A, SY_USER_INFO B WHERE A.ID = B.ID UNION ALL SELECT 'Unknown' AS SO_USER, 'Unknown' AS SO_USER_DESC;

DatabaseView.name: PA_OPPORTUNITY
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_OPPORTUNITY AS SELECT O.ID AS OPPORTUNITY_ID, O.NAME AS OPPORTUNITY_DESC, T.NAME AS OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_NAME FROM SO_OPPORTUNITY O JOIN SO_OPPORTUNITY_TYPE T ON O.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID = T.ID WHERE OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID IN (2535, 2623, 50005, 50667, 50676, 50906, 50918, 51315, 51353, 193506, 318873, 376325, 504613, 540014) ;

DatabaseView.name: PA_ACCOUNT
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_ACCOUNT AS SELECT ID AS ACCOUNT_ID, NAME AS ACCOUNT_DESC FROM SO_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID IN (50646, 50663, 50664, 50665, 50666, 1501, 318872, 2559 )

DatabaseView.name: PA_OPPORTUNITY_TYPE
DatabaseView.ViewDDL: CREATE VIEW PA_OPPORTUNITY_TYPE AS SELECT ID AS OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_ID, NAME AS OPPORTUNITY_TYPE_DESC FROM SO_OPPORTUNITY_TYPE

Context.name: What are the top Gas Performance?
What are the bottom Hardgoods Performance?

UserDefinedGroupFunction.name: DATE_OFFSET_COUNT
UserDefinedGroupFunction.formula: IIF( ISERROR( [$Datedim$].[$Datedim$].CurrentMember ) = FALSE, 1, Count( Head( Hierarchize( [#DatedimPartSet#] ) ).Item(0) : Tail( Hierarchize( [#DatedimPartSet#] ) ).Item(0) ) )

ExcelImport.name: Lookup Values
ExcelImport.title: Import Lookup Values
ExcelImport.prompt: Type name of a Excel workbook with Lookup Values

ExcelImport.name: Multi-Column Lookup Values
ExcelImport.prompt: Select an Excel workbook with a LookupData sheet with multi-column lookup values
ExcelImport.title: Import Multi-Column Lookup Values

ExcelImport.name: Index Values
ExcelImport.title: Import Index Values
ExcelImport.prompt: Type name of a Excel workbook with Index Values

ExcelImport.name: PRICE_ITEM_DATA_IMPORT
ExcelImport.prompt: Type name of a Excel workbook with Price Items (sheet Price_Item_Data)
ExcelImport.title: Import Price Items

ExcelImport.name: COND_TBL_DATA_IMPORT
ExcelImport.prompt: Type name of a Excel workbook with Price Records (sheet Cond_Tbl_Data)
ExcelImport.title: Import Price Records

AttributeSet.name: SELLING_DAY_SET
AttributeSet.Sql: SELECT DISTINCT DAY, SELLING_DAY FROM PA_DATEDIM

AttributeSet.name: CUSTOMER_ATTRIBUTES
AttributeSet.Sql: SELECT SHIP_TO, STRAT_CODE_1, STRAT_CODE_2, STRAT_CODE_3 FROM PA_CUSTOMER

DependencyFilter.name: PRICE_COND_PO
DependencyFilter.DataSource: SELECT DISTINCT PRICING_CONDITION AS PRICING_CONDITION, PO_TYPE AS PO_TYPE, 1 AS DEFAULT_FLAG FROM SO_FS_DEP_FILTER WHERE PO_TYPE IS NOT NULL;
